item.title: Scrollbar Contents (aka Visual Page Contents)
item.description: Scrollbar Contents is a jQuery plugin created by Thomas Hooper to create a scrollbar that represents post/comment volume visually. http://www.stainlessvision.com/scrollbar-contents-aka-visual-page-contents
